description: Reusable but app-bound UI modules may remain in apps/web/src/components/ui and can be imported locally.

rationaleByPattern.@/components/ui/issue: Review-domain UI shape coupled to app-level severity model.
rationaleByPattern.@/components/ui/progress: Review workflow representation coupled to app domain semantics.
rationaleByPattern.@/components/ui/severity: Severity rendering and config are domain-specific to Stargazer review model.
rationaleByPattern.@/components/ui/severity/constants: Domain constants used by review/history features.
rationaleByPattern.@/components/ui/severity/severity-breakd: Domain aggregation display coupled to Stargazer severity taxonomy.
